ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Avid Net Technology is a software and product engineering services company focused on developing Internet of Things (IoT) total solutions for the smart connected environment.

PHILOSOPHY.QOUTE:
Our customers do not need to be at their desks,
the requirement will come itself!

STORY.P1: We provide solutions for a variety of verticals such as agriculture, gardening, husbandry, poultry, industrial automation and etc. Our customized innovative solutions set a new standard for quality, reliability, ease of use and reduced total cost.
STORY.P2: We believe in treating our customers, partners, and suppliers with honesty and integrity in everything we do. Our vision is to play a key role in employing technologies to make life easier and more joyful.

TEAM.DESCRIPTION: Our skilled, creative and highly motivated FAN team members are made up of specialists in system design and integration, electrical and software engineering, GIS and remote sensing, data mining, agriculture and also administration.

SOLUTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Avidnet provides you with smart solutions that improve your productivity.
